metadata.title: CVE-2022-3447 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Inappropriate implementation in Custom Tabs in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 106.0.5249.119 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents ofthe Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:High)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3447` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 107.0.5304.87-0ubuntu11.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 107.0.5304.87-0ubuntu11.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 107.0.5304.87-0ubuntu11.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 107.0.5304.87-0ubuntu11.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 107.0.5304.87-0ubuntu11.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '107.0.5304.87-0ubuntu11.18.04.1').
